DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study evaluate safety efficacy ezetimibe/simvastatin versus atorvastatin elderly patient high cholesterol high moderately high risk coronary heart disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Cholesterol Lowering Effect Ezetimibe/Simvastatin Combination Tablet Compared Another Cholesterol Lowering Drug Elderly Patients With High Cholesterol High Moderately High Risk Coronary Heart Disease ( 0653A-128 )
DOC.criteria: Patient cholesterol level 130 mg/dL great Patient willing maintain cholesterol lower diet long study Patient moderate high risk high risk coronary heart disease per National Cholesterol Education Program Adult Treatment Panel III ( NCEP ATPIII ) guideline Patient weigh less 100 lbs Patient allergy ezetimibe , simvastatin atorvastatin
